summary: A FedEx invoice dated December 16, 2002, detailing shipping charges for account number 1144-2081-6, billed to Jeffrey E. Epstein at his New York address. The document lists numerous shipments sent to various individuals and locations, including known associates and properties linked to Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: The primary account holder and shipper for all FedEx shipments listed on this invoice. His name and New York address appear on every shipment detail.

persons.name: B. Allen
persons.context: Recipient of a FedEx Express Saver package shipped from Epstein's New York address to Miami, FL, on November 14, 2002.

persons.name: W. Doulin
persons.context: Recipient of a FedEx Priority Overnight package shipped from Epstein's New York address to New York, NY, on November 14, 2002.

persons.name: Terry Raccoon
persons.context: Recipient of a FedEx 2Day package shipped from Epstein's New York address to West Palm Beach, FL, on December 3, 2002.

persons.name: Zorro Ranch
persons.context: Recipient address (Zorro Ranch Road, Stanley, NM) for a FedEx Priority Overnight package shipped from Epstein's New York address on December 3, 2002. This is Epstein's New Mexico property.

persons.name: J. Wall
persons.context: Recipient (signed for) a FedEx Priority Overnight package shipped from Epstein's New York address to Abigail Wexner in New Albany, OH, on December 9, 2002.

persons.name: Abigail Wexner
persons.context: Recipient of a FedEx Priority Overnight package shipped from Epstein's New York address to the 'Abigail House' in New Albany, OH, on December 9, 2002.

persons.name: G. Maxwell
persons.context: Recipient of multiple FedEx packages. One was a 2Day shipment to Lisa Anderson in New York on December 9, 2002, and another was a Standard Overnight shipment to 'Sabel Maxwell' in San Francisco on December 10, 2002.

persons.name: Lisa Anderson
persons.context: Recipient of a FedEx 2Day package shipped from Epstein's New York address to New York, NY, on December 9, 2002, addressed to G. Maxwell.

persons.name: L. Sepulveda
persons.context: Signed for a FedEx 2Day package addressed to G. Maxwell/Lisa Anderson in New York on December 10, 2002.

persons.name: Edwina Simmonds
persons.context: Recipient of multiple packages. Received a FedEx Priority Overnight package in New York on December 9, 2002, and a Standard Overnight package from Murray Gell-Mann on December 10, 2002. Also signed for the latter.

persons.name: O. Smithe
persons.context: Signed for a FedEx Priority Overnight package shipped from Epstein's New York address to Central New Mexico Electric Co. in Moriarty, NM, on December 10, 2002.

persons.name: Murray Gell-Mann
persons.context: Listed as the sender on a FedEx Standard Overnight package delivered to Edwina Simmonds in New York on December 11, 2002, billed to Epstein's account.

persons.name: Ron Burckle
persons.context: Recipient of a FedEx 2Day package shipped from Epstein's New York address to Los Angeles, CA, on December 10, 2002.

persons.name: C. Wood
persons.context: Signed for a FedEx 2Day package addressed to Ron Burckle in Los Angeles on December 12, 2002.

persons.name: Peg Ugland
persons.context: Recipient of a FedEx 2Day package shipped from Epstein's New York address to 'N A Property' in New Albany, OH, on December 11, 2002.

persons.name: C. Snyder
persons.context: Signed for a FedEx 2Day package addressed to Peg Ugland in New Albany, OH, on December 13, 2002.

persons.name: J. Epstein
persons.context: Abbreviated recipient name on several shipments sent from Epstein's New York address to Los Angeles, CA, Staten Island, NY, and Brooklyn, NY, in December 2002. Likely refers to Jeffrey Epstein himself.

persons.name: Ban Kucukkoughu
persons.context: Recipient of a FedEx Express Saver package shipped from Epstein's New York address to Marina Del Rey, CA, on December 11, 2002, which required an address correction.

persons.name: C. Maria
persons.context: Signed for a FedEx Express Saver package addressed to Ban Kucukkoughu in Marina Del Rey, CA, on December 13, 2002.

persons.name: Alan Dershowitz
persons.context: Listed as the sender on a FedEx Standard Overnight package delivered to Edwina Simmonds in New York on December 12, 2002, billed to Epstein's account.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: Signed for a FedEx Standard Overnight package from Alan Dershowitz to Edwina Simmonds on December 12, 2002.

persons.name: Nick Simmons
persons.context: Listed under 'Epstein Interest' as the sender reference for a third-party billed FedEx Priority Overnight shipment from the London Fog Company to B. Bonnett in Minnesota on December 4, 2002.

persons.name: B. Bonnett
persons.context: Recipient of a large (250 lb) FedEx Priority Overnight package from the London Fog Company, billed to Epstein's account as a third-party shipment, delivered to Long Lake, MN, on December 5, 2002.

persons.name: W. Walter Bouin
persons.context: Signed for the large FedEx Priority Overnight package addressed to B. Bonnett in Minnesota on December 5, 2002.

connections.description: Epstein's FedEx account was used to ship multiple packages to or involving G. Maxwell in December 2002.
Epstein's FedEx account was used to ship multiple packages to Edwina Simmonds in New York in December 2002.
Epstein's FedEx account was billed for a Standard Overnight package sent by Alan Dershowitz to Edwina Simmonds in December 2002.
Epstein's FedEx account was billed for a Standard Overnight package sent by Murray Gell-Mann to Edwina Simmonds in December 2002.
Epstein's FedEx account was used to ship a package to Abigail Wexner at the 'Abigail House' in Ohio in December 2002.
Epstein shipped a package from his New York address to his Zorro Ranch property in Stanley, NM, in December 2002.

events.title: First Shipments on Invoice
events.description: First recorded shipments on this invoice: FedEx Express Saver to B. Allen in Miami and FedEx Priority Overnight to W. Doulin in New York.

events.title: Shipment to Zorro Ranch and Terry Raccoon
events.description: FedEx Priority Overnight package shipped from Epstein's NY address to his Zorro Ranch property in New Mexico. Also, a FedEx 2Day package sent to Terry Raccoon in Florida.

events.title: Multiple Shipments to Associates
events.description: Multiple packages shipped via FedEx to associates including Abigail Wexner, G. Maxwell/Lisa Anderson, and Edwina Simmonds.

events.title: Shipments from Associates Billed to Epstein
events.description: FedEx shipments sent by associates Murray Gell-Mann and Alan Dershowitz to Edwina Simmonds, with charges billed to Epstein's account.

events.title: Large Third-Party Shipment
events.description: A large (250 lb) FedEx Priority Overnight package from the London Fog Company to B. Bonnett in Minnesota, billed to Epstein's account as a third-party shipment under 'Epstein Interest' and reference 'Nick Simmons'.

locations: 457 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10022-6843 (Epstein's New York Address)
Zorro Ranch Road, Stanley, NM 87056 (Epstein's New Mexico Ranch)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's FedEx account (1144-2081-6) was active and used extensively in November-December 2002, with shipments billed to his New York address.
The invoice shows shipments to Epstein's known property, Zorro Ranch in Stanley, New Mexico, confirming his use of the property at that time.
Several known associates received packages via Epstein's account, including G. Maxwell, Abigail Wexner, and Edwina Simmonds.
The account was used to pay for shipments sent by other individuals, including attorney Alan Dershowitz and physicist Murray Gell-Mann, indicating financial entanglement or provision of services.

A very large (250 lb) third-party shipment from the London Fog Company to an individual in Minnesota was billed to Epstein's account, suggesting business or personal logistics handled through his office.
